columnAttribute.help: Reports the minimum days between any matching visits and the visit returned

columnAttribute.name: num_matching_visits
columnAttribute.help: Count of the matching visits any one of which would cause this visit to be removed or retained, depending on the parameters of the search

plugin.name: histogram

question.summary: In this search, you will build a set of Visits and you can further restrict the visits returned based on the relationship of two different selected visits. You can use the wealth of data in the PRISM study to find Visits with clinically interesting patterns. More here...

question.name: ClinicalVisitsByAllData
question.summary: In this search, you will build a set of Visits using all characteristics associated with that visit including participant and household information. You can use the wealth of data in the PRISM study to find Visits with clinically interesting patterns. More here...
